content: crochet a stunning lace scarf perfect for all seasons this easy scarf pattern uses simple stitches such as chains and double_crochet to work up a gorgeous lace design made with only one ball of red heart croquette yarn this project is perfect to take on-the-go and for gift giving red heart croquette has long striping color repeats and a touch of metallic adding gorgeous definition onto this project pattern is designed by tamara kelly of moogly blog pattern is free at https //www yarnspirations com/products/red-heart-diamond-lace-one-skein-scarf utm\_campaign=2024&utm\_medium=gosadi&utm\_source=influencer\_moogly left-handed video tutorial and more info available at https //www mooglyblog com/one-skein-diamond-lace-scarf/ https //www mooglyblog com/one-skein-diamond-lace-scarf/ crochet a stunning lace scarf perfect for all seasons this easy scarf pattern uses simple stitches such as chains and double_crochet to work up a gorgeous lace design made with only one ball of red heart croquette yarn this project is perfect to take on-the-go and for gift giving red heart croquette has long striping color repeats and a touch of metallic adding gorgeous definition onto this project pattern is designed by tamara kelly of moogly blog right-handed video tutorial included on the pattern listing page left-handed video tutorial and more info available at https //www mooglyblog com/one-skein-diamond-lace-scarf/
